title: change the homepage
extract: To change your homepage in Google Chrome, open your Chrome browser and click on the menu icon represented by three lines on the top right corner of the screen next to the Web address input field. Choose "Settings" from the drop-down options. In the "Settings" screen, check the box labeled "Show Home button".
extract_html: To change your homepage in Google Chrome, open your Chrome browser and click on the menu icon represented by three lines on the top right corner of the screen next to the Web address input field. Choose "Settings" from the drop-down options. In the "Settings" screen, check the box labeled "Show Home button".
